name: Quest of the Mysterious Orb
description:
Controls: WASD + Mouse - controlling the player
Left Mouse Button - Shoot

More info

Quest of the Mysterious Orb is a hack'n'slash game in science fiction climates. It was created as part of a 5-day Game-Jam taking place in Cieszyn. In the game, the player takes on the role of a hero overwhelmed with frenzy, who must recover stolen artifacts that supply energy to her planet, fighting with the forces of drones, mecha-dwarves, etc. Mysterious balls with various types of energy levitating the heroine are given to fight with enemies. 

 Can you recover stolen orbs?  

Work on the game has not been completed, and therefore errors & bugs may occur
